snippet: Mr. Oh, who was involved in some of the private equity firm’s most prominent energy investments, is said to be considering either starting his own firm or joining a smaller firm in a more senior role.
abstract: Mr. Oh, who was involved in some of the private equity firm’s most prominent energy investments, is said to be considering either starting his own firm or joining a smaller firm in a more senior role.

headline.main: Apollo Global Partner Sam Oh Is Said to Be Leaving
